info.description:
Digitraffic is a service operated by the [Fintraffic](https://www.fintraffic.fi) offering real time traffic information. 
Currently the service covers *road, marine and rail* traffic. More information can be found at the [Digitraffic website](https://www.digitraffic.fi/) 


The service has a public Google-group [rail.digitraffic.fi](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/rata_digitraffic_fi) for 
communication between developers, service administrators and Fintraffic. 
The discussion in the forum is mostly in Finnish, but you're welcome to communicate in English too. 


### General notes of the API

* Many Digitraffic APIs use GeoJSON as data format. Definition of the GeoJSON format can be found at https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946.

* For dates and times [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format is used with "Zulu" zero offset from UTC unless otherwise specified 
(i.e., "yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss[.mmm]Z"). E.g. 2019-11-01T06:30:00Z.
info.title: rata.digitraffic.fi

license.name: Digitraffic is an open data service. All content from the service and the service documentation is licenced under the Creative Commons 4.0 BY license.

tags.description: Returns supporting metadata. For example list of stations

tags.name: train-tracking
tags.description: Returns detailed information about train's location

validFrom.description: Start date when this code is used

validTo.description: End date when this code is used. Empty means category is used until further notice

CategoryCode.title: CategoryCode
CategoryCode.description: A code that is used to categorize reasons for a train not being on schedule

description.example: Jos kyseess ei ole kntyv juna ja se on valmis lhtemn etuajassa. Esim. vaihtotit on selkesti suunniteltua vhemmn.

validFrom.description: Start date when this code is used

validTo.description: End date when this code is used. Empty means category is used until further notice

Cause.title: Cause
Cause.description: Details why a train is not on schedule. Train-responses only have ids and codes populated.

departureDate.description: Date of the train's first departure

operatorUICCode.description: Official UIC code of the operator

trainNumber.description: Identifies the train inside a single departure date

version.description: When was this data last modified

CompositionTimeTableRow.title: CompositionTimeTableRow
CompositionTimeTableRow.description: Describes a point in a trains schedule where its composition changes

validFrom.description: Start date when this category code is used

validTo.description: End date when this code is used. Empty means category is used until further notice

DetailedCategoryCode.title: DetailedCategoryCode
DetailedCategoryCode.description: Category code that is one step more detailed from its parent CategoryCode

specifiers.description: Specify a more detailed work area (track element)

trackKilometerRange.description: Track kilometer range, required if notification type is traffic restriction, e.g. (006) 754+0273 > 764+0771

ElementRangeDto.title: ElementRangeDto
ElementRangeDto.description: Two consecutive elements in an identifier range

GeometryDtoobject.title: GeometryDtoobject
GeometryDtoobject.description:
Returns properties: 
"type": corresponds with GeoJSON geometry types
"coordinates": (nested) list(s) of floating point numbers

elementId.description: Identifier of element, required if element pair or ranges are not present

elementPairId1.description: Identifier of element 1 in element pair, required if element or ranges are not present

elementPairId2.description: Identifier of element 2 in element pair, required if element or ranges are not present

elementRanges.description: Element ranges, required if element or element pair is not present

speedLimit.description: Speed limit, required if notification type is traffic restriction and it's type if speed limit

IdentifierRangeDto.title: IdentifierRangeDto
IdentifierRangeDto.description: Place of work: between two track elements or a single track element

beginTimeTableRow.description: Point in schedule where composition starts

endTimeTableRow.description: Point in schedule where composition ends

locomotives.description: List of locomotives used on this leg

wagons.description: List of wagons used on this leg

JourneySection.title: JourneySection
JourneySection.description: Describes a leg where train's composition is in effect

location.description: Location of the locomotive in the train. 1=start of the train

OperatorTrainNumber.title: OperatorTrainNumber
OperatorTrainNumber.description: Operators own a range of train numbers

en.description: English passenger friendly term for the code

fi.description: Finnish passenger friendly term for the code

sv.description: Swedish passenger friendly term for the code

departureDate.description: Date of the train's first departure

trainNumber.description: Identifies the train inside a single departure date

operatingPointId.description: Identifier of operating point, required if section is not present

sectionBetweenOperatingPointsId.description: Identifier of section between operating points, required if operating point is not present

RumaLocationDto.title: RumaLocationDto
RumaLocationDto.description: Location of work, either an operating point or a section between operating points

location.description: Location if no identifer ranges are present

operatingPointId.description: Identifier of operating point, required if section is not present

sectionBetweenOperatingPointsId.description: Identifier of section between operating points, required if operating point is not present

SpatialRumaLocationDto.title: SpatialRumaLocationDto
SpatialRumaLocationDto.description: Location of work, either an operating point or a section between operating points

electricitySafetyPlan.description: Does the notification contain a electricity safety plan

personInChargePlan.description: Does the notification contain a plan for persons in charge

speedLimitPlan.description: Does the notification contain a speed limit plan

speedLimitRemovalPlan.description: Does the notification contain a speed limit removal plan

trafficSafetyPlan.description: Does the notification contain a traffic safety plan

SpatialTrackWorkNotificationDto.title: SpatialTrackWorkNotificationDto
SpatialTrackWorkNotificationDto.description: Describes planned, in-progress or finished track work

axleWeightMax.description: Max axle weight, required if limitation type is max axle weight

finished.description: Finished datetime, required if state is finished

SpatialTrafficRestrictionNotificationDto.title: SpatialTrafficRestrictionNotificationDto
SpatialTrafficRestrictionNotificationDto.description: Describes a restriction affecting the use of a railway infrastructure part

SpeedLimit.title: SpeedLimit
SpeedLimit.description: Speed limit set for a part of a track

passengerTraffic.description: Does this station have passenger traffic

description.example: Jos kyseess ei ole kntyv juna ja se on valmis lhtemn etuajassa. Esim. vaihtotit on selkesti suunniteltua vhemmn.

validFrom.description: Start date when this category code is used

validTo.description: End date when this code is used. Empty means category is used until further notice

ThirdCategoryCode.title: ThirdCategoryCode
ThirdCategoryCode.description: Most detailed category code for a Cause

actualTime.description: Actual time when train departured or arrived on the station

commercialStop.description: Is the stop 'commercial' ie. loading/unloading of passengers or cargo

differenceInMinutes.description: Difference between schedule and actual time in minutes

liveEstimateTime.description: Estimated time for departure/arrival of the train

scheduledTime.description: Scheduled time for departure/arrival of the train

trainStopping.description: Does the train actual stop on the station

unknownDelay.description: Set if the train is delayed, but it is impossible to estimate for how long

TrackLocation.title: TrackLocation
TrackLocation.description: A location on the track. Kilometres and meters are distance from the start of the track

permissionMinimumDuration.description: Requested minimum duration for work permission in ISO 8601 format, e.g. PT30M

plannedWorkingGap.description: Planned working gap in local time with no time zone, e.g. 11:43:00

TrackWorkPartDto.title: TrackWorkPartDto
TrackWorkPartDto.description: A logical part of a track work

deleted.description: Is the train deleted which means cancelled 10 days before its departure date

departureDate.description: Date of the train's first departure

operatorUICCode.description: Official UIC code of the operator

runningCurrently.description: Is the train running currently or does it have actual times

timetableAcceptanceDate.description: When was this train accepted to run on Finnish railways by the FTA

timetableType.description: Is the train ADHOC or REGULAR. REGULAR trains are run for example every monday, ADHOC trains are one-time trains

trainNumber.description: Identifies the train inside a single departure date

TrainReady.title: TrainReady
TrainReady.description: Operator has to ask permission (=TrainReady) to leave certain stations

departureDate.description: Date of the train's first departure

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the message was generated

trainNumber.description: Identifies the train inside a single departure date

type.description: OCCUPY = train entered TrackSection, RELEASE=train exited TrackSection

TrainRunningMessage.title: TrainRunningMessage
TrainRunningMessage.description: TrainRunMessages are generated when a train either enters or exists a TrackSection

offset.description: TrainRunningMessages timestamp is adjusted for offset when generating actual time

timeTableRowStationShortCode.description: For which station is the actual time generated

timeTableRowType.description: For which TimeTableRow is the actual time generated

TrainRunningMessageRule.title: TrainRunningMessageRule
TrainRunningMessageRule.description: These rules define how TrainRunningMessages trigger actual times for TimeTableRows
